about_the_game:
You awaken in darkness, your systems critically damaged. Your ship has crashed, and the fate of the crew is unknown.

**Demo includes the tutorial level and, besides that, about 20 minutes of normal (albeit easy) gameplay.**



Designed to be a perfect warrior, a catastrophic malfunction now leaves you vulnerable and alone. In Breast Simulator, you are a lone android forced into the heart of an alien arena.



In this hostile environment, you must rely on your wits and fragmented combat skills to survive.[/i]



Engage in fast-paced, strategic battles against a multitude of unknown rivals, each with unique abilities and tactics. Earn the favor of powerful overlords through your combat prowess, gaining access to critical upgrades and enhancements. Your ultimate goal: to repair yourself and escape. Will you emerge as a champion or be reduced to scrap? Your survival depends on your every move.



Stop into the arena and fight countless waves of enemies, each more powerful than the previous. For every enemy killed you will gain favor, which can be spend on upgrades and new abilities, enabling you to progress further.



For competitive players, the score up until the first death is stored on the Leaderboard. After the first death, the game will reload to the previous arena wave, but the Leaderboard will not update anymore, unless you start a new game.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains images of female torsos with nipples.

detailed_description:
You awaken in darkness, your systems critically damaged. Your ship has crashed, and the fate of the crew is unknown.

**Demo includes the tutorial level and, besides that, about 20 minutes of normal (albeit easy) gameplay.**



Designed to be a perfect warrior, a catastrophic malfunction now leaves you vulnerable and alone. In Breast Simulator, you are a lone android forced into the heart of an alien arena.



In this hostile environment, you must rely on your wits and fragmented combat skills to survive.[/i]



Engage in fast-paced, strategic battles against a multitude of unknown rivals, each with unique abilities and tactics. Earn the favor of powerful overlords through your combat prowess, gaining access to critical upgrades and enhancements. Your ultimate goal: to repair yourself and escape. Will you emerge as a champion or be reduced to scrap? Your survival depends on your every move.



Stop into the arena and fight countless waves of enemies, each more powerful than the previous. For every enemy killed you will gain favor, which can be spend on upgrades and new abilities, enabling you to progress further.



For competitive players, the score up until the first death is stored on the Leaderboard. After the first death, the game will reload to the previous arena wave, but the Leaderboard will not update anymore, unless you start a new game.
name: Breast Simulator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Breast Simulator is a fast-paced third-person arena survival game, where you face a multitude of unknown rivals, each with unique abilities and tactics. Earn the favor of powerful alien overlords through your combat prowess, gaining access to critical upgrades and enhancements.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*, Afrikaans*, Albanian*, Amharic*, Armenian*, Assamese*, Azerbaijani*, Bangla*, Basque*, Belarusian*, Bosnian*, Catalan*, Cherokee*, Croatian*, Dari*, Estonian*, Filipino*, Galician*, Georgian*, Gujarati*, Hausa*, Hebrew*, Hindi*, Icelandic*, Igbo*, Irish*, K'iche'*, Kannada*, Kazakh*, Khmer*, Kinyarwanda*, Konkani*, Kyrgyz*, Latvian*, Lithuanian*, Luxembourgish*, Macedonian*, Malay*, Malayalam*, Maltese*, Maori*, Marathi*, Mongolian*, Nepali*, Odia*, Persian*, Punjabi (Gurmukhi)*, Punjabi (Shahmukhi)*, Quechua*, Scots*, Serbian*, Sindhi*, Sinhala*, Slovak*, Slovenian*, Sorani*, Sotho*, Swahili*, Tajik*, Tamil*, Tatar*, Telugu*, Tigrinya*, Tswana*, Turkmen*, Urdu*, Uyghur*, Uzbek*, Valencian*, Welsh*, Wolof*, Xhosa*, Yoruba*, Zulu*
